data.actual_result: Server icon prior to saving is very stretched out both left and right.
data.expected_result: Server icon prior to saving and after the saving should be the same.
data.short_description: When uploading a server icon, the server icon in prior-saved screen is oddly off compared to the after-saved icon.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server, which would enable you to have "Add a server icon" model. - Click on it, and add a server icon of a screenshot from your phone. (Check the video, you will understand). - Then, it should lead you to "Edit Photo". Don't edit anything and press Save. - Now, you should be brought back to the server overview setting. Notice the server icon. - Save the changes. Notice the server icon again.
